text: Tarvaris Jackson (April 21, 1983 â€“ April 12, 2020) was an American football quarterback. He was born in Montgomery, Alabama. Jackson played college football at Arkansas and Alabama State. In the National Football League (NFL), Jackson played for the Minnesota Vikings, Seattle Seahawks, and Buffalo Bills. Jackson was killed on April 12, 2020 in a car accident in Pike Road, Alabama, aged 36. ==References== Category:1983 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Road accident deaths in the United States Category:American football quarterbacks Category:African-American players of American football Category:Minnesota Vikings players Category:Seattle Seahawks players Category:Buffalo Bills players Category:Sportspeople from Montgomery, Alabama
title: Tarvaris Jackson
